description: With versatility at its core, the classic norrøna warm2 Jacket is a timeless fleece jacket offering warmth and comfort on any adventure. Made from high-quality recycled polyester and with a classic retro design, this premium fleece will slide into any outfit choice, regardless of your activity. It offers great comfort, quick-drying properties and good insulation combined with great breathability. The two spacious hand warming pockets and a chest pocket with zipper give room for small essentials. Other features include a high collar which provides extra comfort and protection and soft, elastic cuffs with thumb holes.
name: Norrona Norrona Warm2 Jacket - Mens
